actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-206.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3829) to provide for increased participation by the United States in the Inter-American Development Bank, the Asian Development Bank, and the African Development Fund.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 3829 (United States participation in the Inter-American Development Bank, the Asian Development Bank, and the African Development Fund).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3829) to provide for increased participation by the United States in the Inter-American Development Bank, the Asian Development Bank, and the African Development Fund.
